txtEPP: Employee Personality Profile (EPP) is a general personality test that measures twelve personality traits that provide valuable insights into a person's work styles and how they are likely to interact with co-workers, management and customers. The Employee Personality Profile (EPP) will give a percentage match to 12 different job profiles. The higher the percentage match, typically the better the personality fit for that role. People who are more comfortable in their job tend to stay longer, be more productive, and have more success.

combiningHumanIntelligence: Combining human intelligence, technology and artificial intelligence to allow I.T. candidates to have access to the largest pool of opportunities that meet their needs. payFeesOnly: Pay fees only when candidates accept your job offer or consulting contract
ourFeesForEach: Our fees for each placement services are 15% of the first year's annual salary, This amount will be payable on the first day of work of the candidate. Our guarantee i) If a candidate ceases to be employed by your company within the first 90 days after the first day of work for reasons other than those stipulated in paragraph ii) below, we will present candidates to you with the aim of providing you with a replacement at no additional cost. There will be no warranty on this new replacement candidate and no refunds will be provided
ifACandidateCeases: ii) If a candidate ceases to be employed by your company for reasons beyond his control, (i.e. layoffs, redundant position following a merger or acquisition, etc.) the costs are then considered as due
inReturnForThe: In return for the consulting services rendered by the Reelcruit consultant, the Client agrees to pay fees at an hourly rate, fixed as established during the pairing and finalized at the contract signature
theMonthlyIncoice: The monthly invoice will be accompanied by a detailed statement ( weekly Timesheet ) ) of the work carried out describing the services provided during this period. Timesheets will be sent by the candidate at the end of each week to the manager of the candidate to be approved
allApplicableTaxes: All applicable taxes, including GST and QST, will be charged to the

getMatched4steps: Get matched in 4 easy steps with your dream job

thePandemicMade: The pandemic made all of us review the way we do things, companies are by far the most impacted by this global outbreak. Which makes companies suffer from a lack of resources and, therefore, puts pressure to automate their services. More than ever before, companies are now competing for talent which creates an increase in wages and demand for quality resources
foundedByRalph: Reelcruit, founded by Ralph Francois and later joined by two partners , Nancy Lamy and Marco Lestage, understands this reality
recruitmentIndustry: The recruitment industry is rapidly transforming and increasingly using technology to reduce costs and make better decisions faster. Resource qualification, resource retention, and the cost of switching resources are some of the biggest challenges that
appropriationAndSegmentation: The appropriation and segmentation of data to use artificial intelligence is the disruptive element in the industry. That's how Reelcuit will stand out by focusing on creating value with the information compiled
webelieveThatOur: We believe that our tool is the key for a better and optimized recruitment in the I.T. industry

testemunhalSonny: Reelcruit is a service of great professionalism! We took into account my professional experience, my interests and my skills. I really felt that we knew the IT field and that we were working to find a position that suited me. In fact, I was advised during all the hiring stages and, in less than 2 weeks, I got a job that lived up to my expectations.Thanks to Reelcruit and his team.
testemunhalDaniel: ReelCruit offers a different approach and uses cutting-edge recruiting methods. From the first meeting, I felt a lot of listening and understanding on the part of the advisor in relation to our sector of activity. The subsequent meetings aimed at refining the search for candidates demonstrated to me the seriousness and professionalism of the ReelCruit collaborators. The collaborative work we undertook together quickly led to the hiring of a high quality candidate. I highly recommend using ReelCruit for targeted recruiting, especially in today's challenging market environment.

testimonialPhoenix: Ralph was incredibly knowledgeable and intuitive as to what my needs were for finding the right fit for my candidacy profile as a consultant. Reelcruit was quick to identify positions and companies that fit my values and service offerings. I was supported throughout the recruitment process as well as during the mandate. The team was always readily available and provided guidance in moments of uncertainty and made the process seamless and very pleasant.
testimonialSonny: Reelcruit is a service of great professionalism! We took into account my professional experience, my interests and my skills. I really felt that we knew the IT field and that we were working to find a position that suited me. In fact, I was advised during all the hiring stages and, in less than 2 weeks, I got a job that lived up to my expectations.Thanks to Reelcruit and his team.
testimonialYvens: I was pleasantly surprised by the efficiency of the Reelcruit team when it came time to place me, no need to do an endless number of interviews, no paperwork, Reelcruit understands that we need one thing, it's is to work!
testimonialSophia:
Reelcruit provided seamless support throughout the recruitment process. Their support was effective in matching my professional expertise with the right Job. The recruiter Ralph went above and beyond by keeping me informed on every step involved in the process, following up with the employer on my behalf and also negotiating the best deal on my behalf. I successfully secured an amazing job with their help. I definitely recommend Reelcruit to anyone actively seeking employment.
Thank you
testimonialDaniel: Reelcruit offers a different approach and uses cutting-edge recruiting methods. From the first meeting, I felt a lot of listening and understanding on the part of the advisor in relation to our sector of activity. The subsequent meetings aimed at refining the search for candidates demonstrated to me the seriousness and professionalism of the Reelcruit collaborators. The collaborative work we undertook together quickly led to the hiring of a high quality candidate. I highly recommend using Reelcruit for targeted recruiting, especially in today's challenging market environment.
testimonialMarieve: We are very satisfied with the service received and the efficiency that the Reelcruit team has shown in filling our IT positions.
testimonialAnthony: The Reelcruit team quickly helped us in our efforts to find a developer with very specific skills. They quickly understood our needs and helped us find the right candidate in a few weeks. A very good first experience for me and I recommend their service!

nonDiscriminationStatement: At Reelcruit, we value all employees and job candidates as unique individuals, and we welcome the variety of experiences they bring to our group. As such, we have a strict non-discrimination policy. Reelcruit’s goal is for members of our community to feel welcome on the Site. A condition of using the Site is your agreement not to engage in any unlawful discrimination or harassing conduct. Such conduct is not permitted on Reelcruit by any member of our community. We believe everyone should be treated equally regardless of race, sex, gender identification, sexual orientation, national origin, native language, religion, age, disability, marital status, citizenship, genetic information, pregnancy, or any other characteristic protected by law. If you feel that you have been discriminated against, please let your manager or Human Resources Department know as soon as possible. Every complaint will be appropriately investigated. Reelcruit requires Users not to violate local laws or take actions that may subject them to legal liability.
